Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Cicero. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Cicero. Service is resuming.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
